div.head: The true Jew
div.p: As of today we’re publishing a new weekly newspaper called

Our Newspaper is made for the Jewish people as a whole, for everything who finds
interest in important articles about all matters concerning our brothers
in the whole world; in every issue we want to give detailed reports about
all polictical occurances and want to deliver all important news as well as those that belong
to all Jewish matter, as well as general world news. Therefore, every Jew will find in our
paper a short but detailed list about everything important and intereseting and
does not have to make great effort to read Polish or German newspapers, which the gen-
eral public does not completely understand.

However, we want to care that not only the public class reads it. We want
for our paper to be particularly special for our pious brothers, which have not left behind
the true Jewry, which are the religion and our Jewish teaching and also see to teach their children
the truth. Our pious, honest brothers have not had a single Jewish paper until today,
what should be written according to his opinion, his view and his
thoughts, about all the matters, that are concerning Jewish people as a whole, writing and reporting
in a way, which does not harm our ultra-orthodox brothers. This paper
is written in ordinary Jewish language, which everyone should understand, which hasn’t existed yet and this should be our newspaper.
